newsitem.title: USA: Borland spins off consulting group.
newsitem.headline: Borland spins off consulting group.

text.p: Borland International Inc said it spun off the consulting arm of its Open Environment Division to create the independent, privately held NetNumina Solutions Inc of Boston, Mass.
Effective as of April 4, 1997, NetNumina will provide consulting services on behalf of Borland to Open Environment and Borland customers, while servicing new customers.

Borland bought Open Environment Corp in November 1996. Under terms of the agreement, consulting services provided to Borland and its customers by NetNumina include pre-sale and after sale technical support, training, custom development projects, and placement of personnel at customer sites.
